name: SUNSET2SUNRISE
description:
As the sun dips below the horizon, its fiery hues yield to a gentle cascade of twilight, marking the beginning of a nocturnal symphony. 
 
The sky, once ablaze with golden radiance, slowly transforms into a deep indigo canvas, sprinkled with emerging stars and the watchful glow of the moon.
In this quiet interlude, the world seems to hold its breath, inviting a reflective pause as shadows stretch and meld with the soft hum of nighttime whispers. 
 
From the vibrant farewell of sunset to the subtle promise of dawn, the journey through darkness is a serene passage of mystery and hope, where every twinkling light in the vast expanse heralds the imminent return of a new day. 

 Date: 2025-10-20 

 Time: 10:00 PM - 6:00 AM 

 Location: Secret Location (TBA)

 Lineup: Yukoncash, Ayaolah, DSM 

 Tickets: $45 Early Bird, $65 General Admission
